column4: ubottu: puh .. i don't have the iso download file anymore .. only the cd with the image. that page tells me I have to store both into one dir
you should be able to "Verify Disk Integrity" from the Live CD menu (hit any key when first booting to get to the menu)
"you should be able to "Verify Disk Integrity" from the Live CD menu" .. sorry there is only a check of the disc integrity, not the image on the CD
same thing - since you didn't md5sum, that's the best you've got unless you want to re-download
